nodes.text: Refuse incinerator droids, also known simply as Fire-Breathers, were a type of droid used to incinerate garbage on the planet Lotho Minor.

Fire-breathers were quadrupedal droids with three digits emerging from the palm of both front limbs. Its main body contained an interior furnace in which consumed garbage would be burned. Atop its back stood two symmetrical exhaust pipes that produced smoke from the remains of the material incinerated within its body. The head mainly consists of large jaws designed to collect material from the hills of Lotho Minor.
